definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shake (Ar. zal=a slip, zalzala agitate, shake; tazalzala be agitated, quake, esp. of earth-quake)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇזׁ֫לּוּ]] shake, quake Is 63:19 of mts. at ´[[י]]'s presence (Ges De Che Di Du; LXX Vulgate as if fr. [[נזל]] flow down); so Is 64:2 (but here prob. not original Che Di Du); read [[נׇזׁלּוּ]] likewise Ju Jdg 5:5 (LXX Thes Stu Be Bla MV SS; MT [[נׇֽזְלוּ]], fr. [[נזל]]).
